thread.title: Parliament to report on readiness for SONA | News24
thread.title_full: Parliament to report on readiness for SONA | News24

title: Parliament to report on readiness for SONA | News24
text:
Parliament to report on readiness for SONA 2017-02-07 06:14 Iavan Pijoos, News24 (Netwerk24) No extra security at SONA, secretary to Parliament promises 
Cape Town - Parliament will brief media on preparations for hosting the State of the Nation Address on Thursday. 
Deputy National Assembly Speaker Lechesa Tsenoli and the deputy NCOP chairperson Raseriti Tau will brief media on Tuesday. 
President Jacob Zuma will present the address to a joint sitting of the two houses of Parliament. It will be Zumaâ€™s fourth SONA since he was re-elected in May 2014. Join the conversation!
